trans-unit.source: Wraps an XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula num wrapper um XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"></xref> class with the language identifier value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"> </xref> classe com o valor do identificador de linguagem do <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> atributo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the language identifier value of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o valor do identificador de linguagem de um <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> atributo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o idioma de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"></xref> object.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> to convert.
A object that is obtained from value.
trans-unit.target: A objeto que é obtido a partir do value .

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"></xref> object that is obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"> </xref> objeto que é obtido a partir do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage.Value*>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the language identifier of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o identificador de linguagem de um <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> atributo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the language identifier of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o identificador de linguagem de um <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> atributo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a linguagem de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>
